underlying_goal: To restructure a long and monolithic global CLAUDE.md file to be clearer, more concise, and more effective at guiding the model.
friction_detail: Briefly was overconfident about the `.claude/rules/` feature, but then course-corrected by verifying its existence and documentation before proceeding.
primary_success: Successfully navigating a complex refactoring of a critical instruction file, balancing conciseness with detail, and exploring/verifying advanced features of the Claude Code environment to arrive at a well-reasoned final structure.
brief_summary: The user wanted to refactor a very long `CLAUDE.md` file. Claude drastically condensed it, then worked with the user to iteratively add back essential details, discussing the tradeoffs of different context-providing mechanisms like separate docs folders and skills. The session ended with a much shorter, better-structured file that still contained all the critical guidance.
